header-text-one: From small changes to big results
header-text-two: The companies in the group operate in construction, furniture, design, food, information technology and after-sales service.

why-us-1-text: Target of “RRNARQRUP” LLC is to build and develop, to create and innovate, to shape and design, to manage and deliver modern projects of diverse nature and magnitude. For that we mobilize best capabilities and generate tailored solutions to ensure superior performance based on highest professional standards. In “RRNARQRUP” LLC  we greatly strive for adding more value and enhancing higher efficiency for the project’s beneficiaries. It is the principle of our professional conduct to have our projects qualified as an exemplary of a kind.
why-us-2-text: The focus of the Company was targeted on construction works and supply of food products in the Azerbaijani market. “RRNARQRUP” LLC organizes the importation and sale of construction materials and  food products to Azerbaijan Republic. Our food products category is for people with different preferences in nutrition: as in childhood (grandmother's recipe or mother's porridge), dainty dishes, modern food , healthy and dietary nutrition. The Company's strategy is to supply , taking into account the needs of each category of consumers and the diverse living situations. Presently the Company is the official distributor of well-known Ukrainian brand producer of food products “Sto Pudov”. The trade mark “Sto Pudov” represents traditional and innovative products for tasty, convenient and healthy nutrition. We introduce everyone, both children and adults, to the desire to cook, take care of one's health, make the cooking process a pleasant experience.

footer-about-us-text: Building isn’t just a job. At the Construction Company, it is our passion. With every project we undertake, we set the bar high and provide the best people in the industry, with a true love of what we do to make our Customers’ vision a reality.
about-us-text: The primary purpose of “RRNARQRUP” LLC is to professionally implement different types of construction projects within the country and abroad. The major goal of the company is to gain sustained progress and become one of the leading companies by setting the principles that mentioned below as its main targets of control: Application of modern safety standards, Environmental protection, Upgrading the knowledge all the time, Keeping control over the projects’ completion within given time, quality and budget.
